title: New Myths of the Feminine Divine
description: From EPPIE-nominated author Cynthia Joyce Clay comes New Myths of the Feminine Divine, an anthology of short stories with a feminist slant. Covering a range of genres, including Science Fiction, Fantasy and Romance, New Myths bears the hallmarks of Ms. Clay's best work; darkly humorous, poignant and always thought provoking.
author: Cynthia Joyce Clay
